activities: Once a candidate has logged in to the site, Personal Information provided by the candidate is collected and shared with the client(s) for whom the candidate works or for whom the candidate is applying for an employment position.  Aggregate, non-personally identifiable information may be shared with third parties for research purposes.  Personal Information is in no way made available for any third-party marketing purposes.
eucountries: Bulgaria, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and Customer data, online only, no manually processed data
recoursemech: We agree to dispute resolution using JAMS as the third party resolution provider.
